metadata.description: DailyDialog traducido al español para entrenamiento de IA conversacional

turns.speaker: assistant
turns.original_text: I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Yo también estoy bien. ¿Cuáles son tus planes para hoy?
turns.original_text: I'm good too. What are your plans for today?

turns.speaker: assistant
turns.text: I'm planning to study some AI concepts. What about you?
turns.original_text: I'm planning to study some AI concepts. What about you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: That sounds interesting! I might work on my programming skills.
turns.original_text: That sounds interesting! I might work on my programming skills.

turns.speaker: assistant
turns.original_text: Good morning! How did you sleep?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I slept well, thanks. Ready for a new day?
turns.original_text: I slept well, thanks. Ready for a new day?

turns.speaker: assistant
turns.text: Absolutely! I have some exciting projects to work on.
turns.original_text: Absolutely! I have some exciting projects to work on.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: That's great! What kind of projects?
turns.original_text: That's great! What kind of projects?

turns.speaker: user
turns.original_text: Can you help me with something?

turns.speaker: assistant
turns.original_text: Of course! What do you need help with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I'm trying to understand machine learning better.
turns.original_text: I'm trying to understand machine learning better.

turns.speaker: assistant
turns.text: That's a fascinating topic. What specific area interests you?
turns.original_text: That's a fascinating topic. What specific area interests you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I'm particularly interested in natural language processing.
turns.original_text: I'm particularly interested in natural language processing.
